chk_consistent_capabilities.name: chk_consistent_capabilities
chk_consistent_capabilities.value: (kind = 'openai-compatible' AND capabilities IS NOT NULL) OR (kind != 'openai-compatible' AND capabilities IS NULL)

chk_consistent_scope_kind.name: chk_consistent_scope_kind
chk_consistent_scope_kind.value:
(scope_kind = 'default')
      OR
      (scope_kind = 'scenario' AND scenario_id IS NOT NULL)
      OR
      (scope_kind = 'character' AND character_id IS NOT NULL)
      OR
      (scope_kind = 'participant' AND participant_id IS NOT NULL)
